msbt.message: All this stargazing's gonna be great for building up neck muscle! Nope Ow!
I wish for 18-pack abs! I wish for 18-pack abs! I wish for 18-pack abs!I figure if I wish upon enough shooting stars, sooner or later one's gotta grant me that wish!
I wanna to do a sit-up for every shooting star I see, but I keep losing count, !
Someday I wanna run a marathon on a rainbow, but I can't get close enough to one to train!
I tried to run a lap around a rainbow once. It didn't work out.
Seeing a rainbow makes me wanna take up archery. With these delts, I'd totally rock at it!
A rainbow! And another rainbow! It's like some kind of awesome omen. Like, "Today you will do triple sets."
It happened! A double rainbow! My brain muscle can barely cope with this, ! Wow!
Whoa! A double rainbow! That's more than twice as many rainbows as I was expecting today.
Watching the aurora drift around is super hypnotic Whoa! Almost zonked out there.
Auroras look like a giant shower curtain in the sky. Which reminds me I seriously need a shower.
Someone tried to explain auroras to me once. I didn't understand any of it, but I'm glad they tried.
That plane's vapor trail kinda looks like a running trackaaaaand now I wanna do sprints, .
I used to think that if I trained real hard, I could run faster than an airplane. Maybe someday
I wonder how fast I'd have to run to make my own vapor trail. Or maybe it's not about speed
The moon looks like a giant baseball tonightlike a WAAAAY-out-of-the- park home run!
I read that if you train hard enough, you can pole-vault to the moon.<10_4 /> Stop laughing! I really read that!
The moon's like a giant stadium light tonight! I can even hear the crowd cheering,
